title: Initialize engn project
description: Create an 'init' command on the 'engn' application.  The init command will accept a parameter for the project path.  If no parameter is provided use the current working directory.  The init command will create a 'engn.toml' configuration file and create 'arch', 'pm', and 'ux' directories within the project path.  Populate the 'engn.toml' file with path information for the engn data content.

description:
## Description
Simplify the SysEngn toolbar to contain only:
- Left: Application logo (engn_logo_core_tiny_transparent.png)
- Center: Tabs for Home, MBSE, UX, Docs

Remove all other elements (dropdowns, search, terminal toggle, theme toggle, user avatar).

## Acceptance Criteria
- Toolbar shows logo on the left
- Tabs are centered
- Tab navigation switches between views
- BDD acceptance test validates the toolbar

title: Fix TabBar usage error and improve BDD tests
description:
## Problem
TabBar must be used within a Tabs control - error appears at runtime.

## Root Cause
BDD tests only check component structure but don't actually render or validate flet constraints.

## Tasks
1. Understand why BDD tests didn't catch this
2. Update BDD tests to detect rendering issues
3. Fix the toolbar to use correct flet components

Add toolbar and navigation to SysEngn main page
description:
## Description
Add a comprehensive toolbar to the SysEngn main page with:

### Left Section
- Application icon (engn_logo_core_tiny_transparent.png)
- Project/repo dropdown selector
- Workspace/branch dropdown selector

### Center Section
- Tab navigation for work domains: Home, MBSE, UX, Docs

### Right Section
- Search bar
- Terminal toggle icon (opens/closes right drawer)
- Light/dark mode toggle icon
- User avatar (colored circle with initials) with profile/logout menu

### Additional Features
- Right-side terminal drawer (toggle open/close)
- Mock screens for each work domain (Home, MBSE, UX, Docs)
- Mock terminal content in the drawer

## Acceptance Criteria
- Toolbar displays correctly with all sections
- Dropdowns are functional (with mock data)
- Tab navigation switches between work domain views
- Terminal drawer opens/closes on icon click
- Theme toggle switches between light/dark mode
- User avatar shows menu with profile/logout options
- All quality checks pass (ruff, pyright, pytest, behave)
